personalInfo.education: Austin Peay State University (2008, Business Management)

tourBios.carHigh: 2010: Missed the cut at the Chiquita Classic on the Nationwide Tour and the St. Jude Classic on the PGA TOUR. 2009: One of four players to advance to the final stage of the PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament after beginning in a pre-qualifier...Made the cut in seven of 13 starts on the NGA Hooters Tour in 2008. Was victorious in his first startâthe Hilton Garden Inn Classic in Mississippi.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won five times during his college golf career and was named outstanding student-athlete at APSU. Two-time first-team All-Ohio Valley Conference selection. Walk-on to the basketball team for one year...Attended Hickman County High School in Centerville, TN, and was named to the all-state golf team three times. Was also a two-time all-region selection in basketball.
tourBios.personal: Says his biggest thrill outside of golf is dunking on someone. Favorite golf course he's played is his home course, Skyview CC in Centerville...Looks forward to playing Augusta National GC. Never travels without his guitar...First car was a 1993 Pontiac Grand Prix. He now drives a Chevy Impala...Favorite college team is Austin Peay and favorite pro team is the Tennessee Titans...Enjoys watching Fox News. Favorite movie is "Transformers."...Favorite entertainer is Jim Carrey and favorite food is pizza...Favorite athlete to watch is Kobe Bryant. Favorite cities to visit are Nashville, TN, Las Vegas, NV, and Panama City, Panama. Includes his grandfather in his dream foursome. Bucket list includes skydiving, owning a new Corvette and beating Michael Jordan one-on-one. Involved in many church functions. Has one brother and one sister.
